label: MX101x L1: Dialogue
description: Learn Basic Mandarin Lesson 1: Dialogue, Traditional

val:
老師:
大家好,很高興見到你們。
我是你們的老師,你們可以叫我 Estella。我是台灣人,你們呢?
告訴我,你叫什麼名字? 你幾歲? 你從哪裡來?
Dà jiā hǎo, hěn gāo xìng jiàn dào nǐ men.
Wǒ shì nǐ men de lǎo shī, nǐ men kě yǐ jiào wǒ Estella. Wǒ shì Tái wān rén, nǐ men ne?
Gào sù wǒ, nǐ jiào shén me míng zi? Nǐ jǐ suì? Nǐ cóng nǎ lǐ lái?

Teacher:
Hello everyone. I’m very happy to meet you all.
I am your teacher, you can call me Estella. I’m Taiwanese. How about you?
Tell me, What is your name? How old are you? Where are you from?
